overview:
HIGH PERFORMANCE EXECUTIVE with over twenty years of combined experience managing technical and creative people and projects, shaping product direction, defining marketing strategies, and managing consumer and professional products in existing and emerging markets. Marketing-savvy strategist with expertise in driving engineering toward corporate objectives, long-term product planning, product line positioning, messaging, market research / competitive analysis, technology licensing, and launch execution management.

Currently work on TV product planning for Microsoft’s Interactive Entertainment Business (Xbox, Zune, Mediaroom, etc.)
